backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (localStorage user registry, sign-up/sign-in validation, toggle-based auth UI) to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including authentication, dashboard layout, visualizers, hooks, and pages with localStorage-based auth and Indigo/White SaaS theme.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens for sidebar, charts, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon, manifest, Inter font preload, and theme color meta tags for the AXON SOVEREIGN application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for AXON Remote with standalone display mode, portrait orientation, and icon definitions for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (landing, login, signup, dashboard pages) with ProtectedRoute guards, PageTransition wrappers, and DashboardLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Displays a paginated, filterable table of audit logs with CSV export functionality. Fetches audit data via useGetAuditLog hook and supports filtering by action type (LOGIN, ROLE, MEETING, PANIC, ADMIN).
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Monitors and displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory, and query/update call counts. Shows critical alerts when thresholds are exceeded and provides manual refresh capability.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart visualizing five biometric metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates every 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types (joy, surprise, fear, disgust, anger, sadness, neutral) over time with toggleable legend items and simulated data regeneration every 6 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a global network map with four nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) using SVG, showing animated pulse effects on randomly activated nodes every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Renders a real-time area chart of network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds, maintaining a sliding window of 20 data points with random traffic values between 50-150.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a single meeting log entry as a card showing title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary with encrypted badge icon.
Shows a live-updating meeting cost ticker that increments by ₹12.5 per second with pause/resume controls and displays the current total cost in large text.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Displays a real-time scrolling log of simulated security events (encryption, packet, neural, quantum) with auto-generated entries every 2-3 seconds, keeping the last 50 logs.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Shows quantum encryption metrics in a grid layout with four cards displaying key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness score with circular progress indicator.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a static table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using colored badges to indicate security and status levels.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live area chart tracking simulated vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, updating every 3 seconds with a sliding 21-point window.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of four speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels, displaying animated progress bars that update every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Displays a scrolling terminal-style log of simulated system security events across six categories (encrypt, sensory, auth, network, biometric, packet), generating new entries every 2-3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Renders a 4x4 grid matrix showing threat counts for combinations of attack vectors and categories, with color-coded severity levels and pulse animations for active threats, updating every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and duration over a 5-minute period. Includes real-time playback indicator and interactive segment selection.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wraps children in authentication check, redirecting to login if not authenticated. Shows loading spinner during auth verification and wraps authenticated content in ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Enforces role-based access control by checking user role against required role (admin or user). Redirects to dashboard with toast notification if access is denied.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Renders a pulsing green dot with tooltip indicating active status.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal displaying categorized keyboard shortcuts with search functionality, triggered by '?' key. Shows shortcuts for security protocols, privacy features, system commands, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component displaying a metric with title, value, icon, and optional trend indicator. Features hover animation and clean layout.
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled primary call-to-action button with emerald gradient, shadow effects, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Toggleable FPS counter overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures and displays real-time frame rate with color-coded performance indicators.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Animated gradient beam effect that travels along the border of its container in a diagonal pattern.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: 3D rotating orb visualization with radial gradient, glow effects, and ripple animations on hover.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors and displays a styled error UI with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Card wrapper component with glassmorphism styling and optional animated border beam effect.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout component with responsive sidebar navigation, user session management, and navigation items for Overview, Vault, Neural Logs, and Settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying AXON branding, navigation links organized by Product/Resources/Legal sections, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates based on mouse position relative to the button with configurable strength and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: Interactive biometric authentication component supporting fingerprint and face ID scanning modes with animated progress indicators and haptic feedback.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Status indicator component showing whether the AI neural proxy is ready or in standby mode with appropriate icons and messages.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Circular progress indicator with SVG animation displaying synthesis progress percentage for neural processing tasks.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload component for audio files with visual feedback, file validation, and display of uploaded audio file details.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Dashboard displaying voice quality metrics (pitch stability, clarity index, tone quality) with progress bars and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: Calendar-based scheduling component for booking security audit calls with date picker, time slot selection, and confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Displays a real-time dark web threat monitoring dashboard with filtering by threat type and severity, generating simulated threats periodically and allowing CSV export of threat reports.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: Provides an audio environment mixer interface with volume sliders for 8 different ambient environments (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for tactical audio masking.
Displays a grid of 16 environment presets with play/stop controls for audio spoofing, using placeholder images for different locations like office, jet, cafe, and airport.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Provides buttons to trigger fullscreen fake OS update screens (Windows 11 and macOS) for hardware mimicry, with a close button to dismiss.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Simulates network packet jitter with a slider control showing degradation level, quality percentage, latency, and packet loss metrics, with a Ctrl+Shift+L keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fullscreen fake Windows update screen with progress bar as a panic protocol, dismissible via Ctrl+Shift+Q keyboard shortcut and tracked in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Allows users to select bandwidth quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) with live bandwidth usage meter and savings calculations, persisting selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Displays a scrollable terminal-style log of WebSocket connection events with timestamps, simulating periodic heartbeat and authentication messages.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Renders a testimonial card component with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: A fixed-position video widget component with play/pause, minimize/maximize, and close controls, displaying an operator briefing thumbnail with playback simulation.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: A 3D globe visualization using Three.js and React Three Fiber that displays global network nodes with latency-based color coding and animated connection arcs between locations.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: A canvas-based audio wave visualizer that renders animated sine waves in multiple colors to simulate real-time frequency analysis.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: A canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that continuously scrolls frequency bars downward, creating a time-based visualization of audio spectrum data.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider for managing ghost mode state, persisting the toggle state in sessionStorage across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with authentication, handling identity changes and invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Hook providing haptic feedback functions (light, medium, heavy) using the browser's vibration API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Hook that listens for keyboard shortcut combinations and triggers a callback when all specified keys are pressed simultaneously.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Hook that tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic events, audit logs, session recordings, and system health metrics via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (colors, radius, sidebar), utility classes for ghost mode blur, and fade-in animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring; displays current user profile and role information.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays a grid of encrypted meeting logs fetched from the backend, showing a skeleton loader or empty state when no meetings exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Overview dashboard showing metric cards for encrypted data, sentinel nodes, and security health, plus live traffic chart and recent files table.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page showing a QR code for mobile pairing and a connection log for tactical remote control setup.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer performance monitoring page displaying system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage, and historical memory charts with critical threshold alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, security architecture features, testimonials, video welcome widget, and CTAs for signing up to the sovereign neural defense platform.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login and signup page with form handling for authentication using local storage, including email/password validation, session management, and animated UI transitions between signin and signup modes.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-optimized biometric authentication page with a back button navigation and BiometricScanner component.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Neural voice cloning lab interface with vocal sample upload, synthesis progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display in a bento grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Tactical security controls page featuring emergency panic mode, environment spoofing, packet jitter simulation, hardware mimicry, and environment mixer components with color-coded threat levels.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Performance settings page containing bandwidth optimization controls for system performance tuning.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Internet Identity-based signup page that handles authentication flow, creates user profiles via backend actor, and navigates to dashboard upon successful account creation.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Subscription pricing page displaying Basic (₹300/month) and Premium (₹500/month) tiers with feature lists and simulated payment flow.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile tactical command interface with large touch-friendly buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning with haptic feedback.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Provides localStorage-based authentication utilities for user registration, login, session management, and email validation with USER/ADMIN role support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and parameter cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, custom animations, and typography/container plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking Axon Sovereign's architecture, features, and transition from dark glassmorphism to light-mode Enterprise SaaS design with localStorage authentication and multi-page React architecture.
